DescriptionData.Title: Sports Resistance Band, Set Of 3 Exercise Band Pull Up Assist Band Ideal For Women Men, For Strength Training,Yoga,Pilates,Fitness
DescriptionData.Description:
★ Welcome to LDXLR's home, we will show the best products and best service. Hope you have the best shopping experience and look forward to your visit.
-Resistance bands can be used for whole body exercise. It is a multifunctional resistance band and is the most popular resistance band on the market today.

★ Specifications

-Material: Natural Latex
-Size: 1500 * 150 * 0.35mm
-Use: hip-lifting, beautiful legs, core training, strength training

★ Function
✔ Pull-ups-build strength and build muscle.
✔ Versatile-Band size and range of exercise options for all muscle groups.
✔ Portable-Use at home, gym or on the go.
✔ The highest quality-100% natural latex.

-After-sales service: The resistance band is designed with durability and quality in mind, so you can rest assured. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us first and we will resolve the issue within 24 hours.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ► 【Idea for All Workouts】 Our versatile workout bands for women, men and children can be used in your cross-fit, Pilates, yoga,beach body and even dance and ballet routines to get integrated.

► 【Latex material】 The resistance band consists of environmentally friendly natural latex. You feel safe and comfortable when stretching. You don't have to worry that it is rough on your skin and a burning

► 【Portable And Efficient Loop Bands】Lightweight resistance band makes it easy to bring them everywhere. You can have a efficient workout with this hip band wherever you go by doing leg and butt exercises, stretching, yoga,etc.

►【Fashion Sports Fan】-Body shaping and beautifying hip curve. What you need is just a stretch hip. Built-in non-slip rubber strip, classic colors and matching colors, it becomes fashionable and trendy in seconds.

► 【Satisfaction Guarantee】- Welcome to LDXLR's home. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us immediately. We will resolve this issue within 24 hours and hope our customers have the best shopping experience.

-Resistance bands can be used for whole body exercise. It is a versatile resistance band and is the most popular resistance band on the market today.

★ Specifications
-Name: Yoga stretch band
-Size: 1500 × 150 × 0.3MM
-Use: hip-lifting, beautiful legs, rehabilitation training, strength training

★ Function
✔ Pull-ups-build strength and build muscle.
✔ Versatile-Band size and range of exercise options for all muscle groups.
✔ Portable-Use at home, gym or on the go.
✔ The highest quality-100% natural latex.
✔ Physical Therapy-Ideal for rehabilitation and improvement of mobility.

★ Warm Tips
-Due to manual measurement and different measurement tools, there may be slight errors in the data.
-There may be slight color differences due to different monitors. Please refer to the actual product
-After-sales service: The resistance band is designed with durability and quality in mind, so you can rest assured. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us first and we will resolve the issue within 24 hours.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ 【Idea for All Workouts】- Our versatile workout bands for women, men and children can be used in your cross-fit, Pilates, yoga,beach body and even dance and ballet routines to get integrated.

★ 【High Elasticity】- After thousands of tests, the resistance band has been found to have excellent resilience. When stretched to multiple lengths, it can quickly return to its original state. It will not deform or break after strong stretching, which is more conducive to exercise.

★【Convenient and Flexible】- Put these resistance bands in pocket or the lovely black carrying pouch then you would own a potable gym. These lightweight bands could let you do exercise wherever you want.

★【Multi Applicability】- The resistance bands set is not only suitable for young professional athletes, but is also useful for the elderly. Whether it's the warm-up exercise for athletes before sport, the skeleton exercises for seniors or bodybuilding exercises for young people, the resistance band is an indispensable sporting equipment.

★【Satisfaction Guarantee】- Welcome to LDXLR's home. If the product does not meet or exceed your expectations, please contact us immediately. We will resolve this issue within 24 hours and hope our customers have the best shopping experience.
